title: Concept art - Alchemist's workshop.jpg
summary: Visual reference for alchemist's workshop with hidden details
content:
Detailed digital painting of an alchemical workspace featuring: 
• Central workbench with alembics and retorts  
• Wall-mounted celestial charts (zodiac symbols)  
• Shelves holding rare ingredient jars (dragon scales, phoenix feathers)  
• Hidden compartment beneath floorboards containing Valerius' journal
